---
title: "About"
---

This Comic Book is a scientific outreach product designed by the Editors during the [TUM Researcher Program](https://www.tum.de/lebenslanges-lernen/angebote-mitarbeitende/people-development/career-design/researcher). TUM Researcher is a 12-month qualification programme from the [Technical University of Munich](https://www.tum.de/) that prepares researchers for a responsible leadership role in research.

<br>

## Funding

The Comic Book was funded by [The Daylight Academy](https://daylight.academy/), [eConversion](https://www.e-conversion.de/de/), and [crc325](https://crc325.de/).

## Contributing

You can contribute by translating this comic book to your native language. If you are interested, get in touch with Dr. Anna Biller: [anna.biller\@tum.de](anna.biller@tum.de)
